title: IDOC joins nationwide effort in raising awareness of violence prevention (Illinois Department of Corrections)
text: ( Source : Illinois Department of Corrections ) SPRINGFIELD - October 22 , 2015 - The Illinois Department of Corrections ( IDOC ) continues to make great strides in raising the awareness of Violence Prevention during the month of October by
